channel.title: can team black mesa to complete opposing force 2
channel.description: as we know, the mod opposing force 2 has been abandoned, but the guys have released all of they works. The black mesa team can complete this mod? as it will be the connection between HL 1 e HL 2? sorry my bad english. [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/opposing-force-2[/url]

item.title: can team black mesa to complete opposing force 2
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Opposing Force 2: The tale of a US Marine stuck on a helicopter in the middle of the void.
Enjoy exciting gameplay of scraping moss off the hull of your Osprey for protein and using your fatigues to filter urine into something somewhat drinkable!

Addendum!

Crypt:

Skyms shows cool Blue Shift Screenshot: “You should make Op4!”
PSR Shows cool HC screenshot: "You should make Decay!
Juniez shows cool model: “You should make (insert complicated model)!”

item.title: can team black mesa to complete opposing force 2
item.dc:creator: fresh_heels
item.description:
Dude, the team has like a half of a game to finish.
And by finish I mean make from nothing pixel by pixel, polygon by polygon.
It’s not a job for a week or two.

Basically, what zerniz0 said: if you want for it to be done, do it yourself.
